entries.name: Mighty Blow
entries.description: +1 INJURY DICE to melee attacks.

entries.name: Iron Will
entries.description: +1 DICE to Morale checks.

entries.name: Weapon Master
entries.description: No off-hand penalty when fighting with two weapons.

entries.name: Resilient
entries.description: -1 INJURY MODIFIER to all Injury Rolls against this model.

entries.name: Brutal Charge
entries.description: +1 DICE to melee attacks when charging.

entries.name: Strong
entries.description: Gains the STRONG keyword. Can use 2H melee weapons in one hand.

entries.name: Sharpshooter
entries.description: No Long Range penalty.

entries.name: Quick Shot
entries.description: May shoot twice per activation (second shot at -1 DICE).

entries.name: Eagle Eye
entries.description: +1 DICE to ranged attacks when Elevated.

entries.name: Steady Hands
entries.description: HEAVY weapons no longer prevent movement.

entries.name: Suppressive Fire
entries.description: Target of ranged attack suffers -1 DICE to next activation even on miss.

entries.name: Deadeye
entries.description: +1 INJURY DICE to ranged attacks.

entries.name: Sprint
entries.description: +2 Movement.

entries.name: Infiltrator
entries.description: May deploy anywhere more than 8" from enemy models.

entries.name: Dodge
entries.description: -1 DICE to enemy ranged attacks targeting this model.

entries.name: Acrobat
entries.description: Climbing and jumping rolls automatically succeed.

entries.name: Scout
entries.description: May make a free Move action before the first turn.

entries.name: Elusive
entries.description: Enemies do not get free attacks when this model retreats.

entries.name: Lucky
entries.description: Once per game, may re-roll any single dice roll.

entries.name: Tough
entries.description: Gains the TOUGH keyword. First OOA result becomes Down instead.

entries.name: Commander
entries.description: Friendly models within 6" gain +1 DICE to Morale checks.

entries.name: Scavenger
entries.description: After each game, gain D6 x 10 additional ducats.

entries.name: Fearsome
entries.description: Gains the FEAR keyword.

entries.name: Chosen
entries.description: Gain +1 Blessing Marker at the start of each game.
